=== Current Issues ===
<pre>
Boot splash colors are corrupted (bug 21478)
No 3D acceleration
Trackpad is painfully slow
Backlight does not turn off when lid closed
Backlight brightness controls do nothing
No right click solution for single button trackpad
No single or double tap on the trackpad
No scroll on the trackpad
</pre>
